4. modules

4.1. modules.api.api_routes

modules.api.api_routes.addEndpointGroups(data=None, endpointGroupType=None, domain=None)[source]

Add a single Endpoint Group

4. Request Payload

{
    name: <string>,
    calllimit: <int>,
    auth: {
        type: "ip"|"userpwd",
        user: <string>
        pass: <string>
        domain: <string>
    },
    endpoints [
        {
            hostname:<string>,
            description:<string>
            weight:<string>
        },
        ...
    ],
    strip: <int>,
    prefix: <string>,
    notifications: {
        overmaxcalllimit: <string>,
        endpointfailure: <string>
    },
    cdr: {
        cdr_email: <string>,
        cdr_send_interval: <string>
    }
    fusionpbx: {
        enabled: <bool>,
        dbhost: <string>,
        dbuser: <string>,
        dbpass: <string>
    }
}

4. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            endpoints: [
                <int>,
                ...
            ]
        }
    ]
}
modules.api.api_routes.addNumberEnrichment(request_payload=None)[source]

Add a one or multiple enrichment rules

4. Request Payload

{
    data: [
        {
            dnid: <str>,
            country_code: <str>,
            routing_number: <str>,
            rule_name: <str>
        },
        ...
    ]
}

4. Response Payload

{
    error: <str>,
    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>
        },
        ...
    ]
}

modules.api.api_routes.fetchNumberEnrichment(request_payload=None)[source]

Fetch a CSV to import from an external server

Updates and adds rules by default

If replace_rules is True then current rules are replaced

4. Request Payload

{
    data: [
        {
            url: <str>
        },
        ...
    ],
    replace_rules: <bool>
}

4. Response Payload

{
    error: <str>,
    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            rule_id: <int>,
            dnid: <str>,
            country_code: <str>,
            routing_number: <str>,
            rule_name: <str>
        },
        ...
    ]
}
modules.api.api_routes.generateCDRS(gwgroupid, type=None, email=False, dtfilter=datetime.datetime(1, 1, 1, 0, 0), cdrfilter='', nonCompletedCalls=True)[source]

Generate CDRs Report for a gwgroup

Parameters

  • gwgroupid (int|str) – gwgroup to generate cdr’s for

  • type (str) – type of report (json|csv)

  • email (bool) – whether the report should be emailed

  • dtfilter (datetime) – time before which cdr’s are not returned

  • cdrfilter (str) – comma seperated cdr id’s to include

Returns

returns a json response or file

Return type

flask.Response

modules.api.api_routes.updateEndpointGroups(gwgroupid=None)[source]

Update a single Endpoint Group

The gwgroupid can be provided in url path or payload

4. Request Payload

{
    name: <string>,
    calllimit: <int>,
    auth: {
        type: "ip"|"userpwd",
        user: <string>
        pass: <string>
        domain: <string>
    },
    endpoints [
        {
            gwid:<int>,
            hostname:<string>,
            description:<string>
            weight:<string>
        },
        ...
    ],
    strip: <int>,
    prefix: <string>,
    notifications: {
        overmaxcalllimit: <string>,
        endpointfailure: <string>
    },
    cdr: {
        cdr_email: <string>,
        cdr_send_interval: <string>
    }
    fusionpbx: {
        enabled: <bool>,
        dbhost: <string>,
        dbuser: <string>,
        dbpass: <string>
    }
}

4. Response Payload

{
    error: <string>,
    msg: <string>,
    kamreload: <bool>,
    data: [
        {
            gwgroupid: <int>,
            endpoints: [
                <int>,
                ...
            ]
        }
    ]
}

    msg: <str>,
    kamreload: <bool>,

            rule_id: <int>
        },
        ...
    ]

Contains methods for accessing the flowroute Numbers api

__init__()[source]

__weakref__

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

getNumbers(starts_with=None, contains=None, ends_with=None, limit=1000000, offset=None)[source]

Get flowroute DID’s associated with accnt

See also

flowroute list numbers

Parameters

  • starts_with – match numbers starting with..

  • contains – match numbers containing..

  • ends_with – match numbers ending with..

  • limit – limit of matched numbers

  • offset – offsets list of numbers returned

Returns

list(*str)
